# cloudkarafka_user (Resource)

Manage a user.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `instance_id` (Number) Id of the instance where we want to manage the user.
- `name` (String) Name of user.

### Optional

- `type` (String) Type of user, either sasl or ssl.
